localize.text: Start a new game with the current Abnormality observation levels.

The story ends here. There are no new departments to open in Challenge Mode. The daily PE-Box quota will progressively increase. Survive and manage the facility for 99 days! The game cannot be saved in this mode. The observation level will persist through games.
Oops! You’ve found a hidden button!
Your employees, every Encyclopedia entry, and all other game progression will be lost, even your precious memories with me. Do you really want to restart everything from scratch?
There’s no need to start from scratch.
Hi manager! Would you like to research this project?
You will be able to pause the game.
The Control Team monitors the employees and Abnormalities and plans out the best course of action.

The Control Team monitors the employees and Abnormalities and plans out the best course of action. They give immediate orders to other employees while watching the CCTV feeds. They tend to be quite bossy and assertive, making them unpopular with other teams.
So… You wanna do this research?
You will be able to access the Team Rosters.
The Safety Team gives safety training to new employees and responds to potential incidents and threats to the company.

The Safety Team gives safety training to new employees and develops action plans for all kinds of potential emergencies that can occur in the company. They establish strategies for situations such as escaping Abnormalities, panicking employees and security breaches, as well as setting up safety guidelines for others to follow. They are notably meticulous and punctual.
Hiya manager, do you want to proceed with this research project?
The Training team is in charge of composing and regulating company policies and various management procedures.

The Training team is in charge of composing and regulating company policies and various management procedures. They also run general-purpose training programs to help employees adapt well to their new departments.
Do you plan to proceed with this research project, manager?
You will be able to see the HP and SP of the Agents.
The Information Team analyzes the Abnormalities, profiles them, and devises solutions to possible issues based on the data.

The Information Team analyzes the Abnormalities, profiles them, and devises solutions to issues the Abnormalities may cause based on the data. They are in charge of collecting, analyzing, and archiving observation data and interview logs provided by the Welfare Team. The vast library of data is the basis for finding “solutions” to various problems encountered in the energy harvesting process; they often conduct experiments to determine the consistency and safety of the solution. All of the invaluable information could be gathered thanks to long-term observations and numerous sacrifices made by the team, not armchair theorizing as some suspect… is what they asked us to write here.
So, you want to proceed with this research?
The Central Command Team represents the Middle Layer of the facility.

The Central Command Team represents the Middle Layer of the facility. The upper and lower halves of Central Command take the role of the foundation for the facility, which allows expansion upwards and downwards. The department also functions as a bridge between the Upper and Lower Layers, making it a valuable strategic location.
Mutually complementing the 1st Team, this team supervises all the departments and researches various management methods.

Mutually complementing the 1st Team, this team supervises all the departments and researches more efficient management methods. Employees in the lower half of Central Command take great pride in their aesthetic sense; some say they spend a majority of their time in the morning debating on what to wear for the day. This department has a hidden struggle with the Control Team over leadership.
Hey mister manager, you thinking of researching this one~?
As the department’s namesake, it handles all welfare related duties in the facility.

With the goal of preventing epidemics and secondary infection caused by Abnormalities, the Welfare Team puts preventative measures into action and works on programs that benefit the physical fitness and mental health of employees. In-house welfare is one of the highest values Lobotomy Corporation pursues; for the protection of our valuable resources… ah, no, I mean the lives of our employees.
You gonna get this research put through?
As the title implies, this department establishes and enforces the rules and regulations of the company and handles employee discipline.

The most hardcore of all departments, the Disciplinary Team creates regulations and punishments with a variety of intents, be it for when an employee violates material rules, when one leaves their obligations unfulfilled or neglects their job, if the company were to be damaged enormously, and so on. The Disciplinary Team is the best at handling and sanctioning any situation, no matter if it is with an Abnormality or one of our own employees.
Is this the research you elect to move forward with?

This department handles all physical material needed to maintain the company. They play a big role in the upkeep of everything by restoring collapsed facilities and extracting E.G.O. The arrangement, restoration, and extraction of Abnormalities are some of the duties that lie with this department as well. As such, its employees are always facing something from the Well, and moreover have an empty borehole within their hearts.
Shall we step ahead with this research, then?
You will be able to pause the game.

The department in which everything that occurs in the company is recorded. There are endless pages to be filled, but the last is always empty. The contracting and promotion of employees is decided by their records and assessments, so the employees always try to get on the good side of those who work in the Record Team; no one knows when [Record Deletion] will take place.
Press the Escape (ESC) Key to restart.
Start over from the most recent Checkpoint: Day
has no assigned employees. Please assign at least one employee before starting the day.
As Dawn breaks, hope may turn to despair.
So long as the sun stays high, the blight will remain weak.
Stay vigilant, ready oneself for the darkness that slowly creeps in.
There is no salvation in the dark, abandon all hope you have left.
Resuming Energy Extraction and Refinement Flow
Resuming Scenario: The Seed of Light
The memories of all the Sephirot have been synchronized.

The employees, the Abnormalities, the Sephirot, and the facility; this place is the first will of everything. The orders that are meant to guide us to the righteous place are born here and echo through the entire facility. Infinite possibilities shall bloom by the will of the one who faces and the one who listens. Be prepared for the age of humanity.
Please proceed with the selected research.
